title: Message to President Daniel Salamanca on the Anniversary of the Founding of the Bolivian Republic.
text:
ON BEHALF of the Government and people of the United States of America and in my own name I ask Your Excellency to accept hearty congratulations on this great national anniversary of Bolivia.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Daniel Salamanca, The President of Bolivia, La Paz, Bolivia]
